exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="InfoUISkin" width="598" height="902" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<!--<e:Label text="游戏说明" width="656" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x4A4A4A" size="48"/>-->
	<e:Scroller id="scrListInfo" height="780" width="598" x="0" y="100">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:List id="infoMation" height="780" width="598">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="6" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
		<e:Skin>
	</e:Skin>
</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="infomationListSkin" width="598" height="1400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" text="{data.info}" x="30" y="0" size="30" width="538" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFEDBD" lineSpacing="10"/>
	<!--<e:Image height="1063" width="656" y="0" source="{data.info}" x="-5" />-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GoodsUISkin" width="663" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<!--<e:Label text="排行榜" width="656" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x4A4A4A" size="30"
	             fontFamily="微软雅黑" />
	-->
	<e:List id="score" height="104" width="663" y="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout gap="6" />
		</e:layout>
	</e:List>
	<e:Label text="排行" x="97" y="104" textColor="0x333333" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" />
	<e:Label text="头像" x="232" y="104" textColor="0x333333" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" />
	<e:Label text="昵称" x="366" y="104" textColor="0x333333" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" />
	<e:Label text="积分" x="499" y="104" textColor="0x333333" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" />
	<e:Scroller id="scrListGoods" height="630" width="663" x="0" y="200">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:List id="listGoods" height="630" width="663">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="6" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
		<e:Skin></e:Skin>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="goodsListIRSkin" width="656" height="122" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="{data.hope}"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" text="{data.goodsName}" x="326" y="0" size="30" width="160" textAlign="center"
	         verticalAlign="middle" textColor="{data.realColor}" height="122" strokeColor="{data.color}" stroke="{data.size}" />
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="0" text="{data.comment}" textAlign="left" width="220" size="30" verticalAlign="middle"
	         x="515" textColor="{data.realColor}" height="122" strokeColor="{data.color}" stroke="{data.size}" />
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="0" text="{data.rank}" width="220" size="30" x="95" textColor="{data.realColor}" height="122"
	         textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" strokeColor="{data.color}" stroke="{data.size}" />
	<e:Image height="72" width="72" y="25" source="{data.icon}" x="229" />
</e:Skin>
